text: FIRST BOOKOF THE HISTORY. 367 Section XC. (a) M. Valerius Trachalus was joint consul with Silius Italicus, A.U. G. 821. See Appendix to An- nals, xvi. (b) Gtho left the city of Rome on the 24th day of March, as appears from Suetonius, who mentions his neglect of the institutions relating to the Ancilia, as an inauspicious beginning of the war. Suetoniu3 adds, that he set out on the day when all who paid their worship to the mother of the gods began the usual ceremonies. Now that day was the gth of the kalends of April, which answers to the 24th of March. See Suetonius, Life of Otho, s. 8.
